definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: I bought a second-hand five Cpiece suite.
sentences.chinese: 我买了一套二手的五件套家具。

sentences.english: Look, the moving van is backing into their driveway.
sentences.chinese: 你看，运家具的大卡车正在往他们家的车道上倒车呢。

sentences.english: Visible at that time, contend for effect bookman , furniture of snap up fine wood also is one of vogue.
sentences.chinese: 可见当时，争效文人，争购细木家具也是时尚之一了。

sentences.english: So export issue of China's furniture industry was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 鉴此，本文对中国家具行业的出口问题进行了研究。

sentences.english: His house was dismantled of all its furniture.
sentences.chinese: 他们房子的家具全被拆除了。

sentences.english: Furniture suits to use take carven Euramerican furniture style.

sentences.english: The another big characteristic that small family bedroom places furniture is to fore-and-aft development.
sentences.chinese: 小户型居室放置家具的另一大特色就是向纵向发展。

sentences.english: Please don't touch the furniture with sticky hands.
sentences.chinese: 请不要有黏乎乎的手碰家具。

sentences.english: You may want to change the furniture placement in your living room or paint the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 你也许会想更换客厅里家具的位置或者卧室里的挂画。

sentences.english: Employment in U.S. furniture factories fell by 60% over the last decade.
sentences.chinese: 过去10年中，美国家具厂的就业人数减少了60%。

sentences.english: No. You know how much it can cost to furnish an apartment?
sentences.chinese: 那不行。你知道添置一间房的家具得花多少钱？

sentences.english: Phil removed his old furniture from the house and took it to the dump.
sentences.chinese: 菲尔清除厂屋内的旧家具并拿到垃圾场去丢厂。

sentences.english: Do you need a furnished or unfurnished apartment?
sentences.chinese: 你需要带家具还是不带家具的公寓？

sentences.english: Do you need a furnished or unfurnished apartment?
sentences.chinese: 你需要带家具还是不带家具的公寓？

sentences.english: Your selection of living room furniture is quite discriminating.
sentences.chinese: 你对客厅家具的选择是很有品味的。
